comments: For n >= 1 a(n) is the order of the wreath product of the symmetric group S_n and the Abelian group (C_7)^n. - Ahmed Fares (ahmedfares(AT)my-deja.com), May 07 2001a(n) = 7*A034834(n) = product(7*k,k=1..n), n >= 1.
